faqs.title: FAQs related to Bus Tickets Booking

q1.question: Can I track the location of my booked bus online?
q1.answer: Yes, you can track your booked bus location online through the Travler tracking feature (if the bus operator supports live tracking).

q2.question: What are the advantages of purchasing a bus ticket with Travler?
q2.answer: Travler offers benefits such as easy booking, multiple payment options, discounts, 24/7 customer support, and access to both private and government bus operators.

q3.question: Why book bus tickets online on Travler?
q3.answer: With Travler, you save money, earn credits on every booking, and enjoy access to multiple routes and operators.

q4.question: Do I need to create an account on the Travler site to book my bus ticket?
q4.answer: No, you can book without creating an account, but having an account makes it easier to manage bookings and get offers.

q5.question: Does bus booking online cost me more?
q5.answer: No, online booking typically costs the same as offline booking, and you may even get extra discounts or cashback offers.

q6.question: How can I get the discounts on the bus booking?
q6.answer: You can use promo codes, seasonal offers, or loyalty points available on Travler to get discounts.

q1.question: How do I book a ticket?
q1.step1.desc: Enter your travel details (From, To, Date) and click Search.
q1.step1.note: Note: "Sorry, no seat available" means buses are fully booked.
q1.step2.desc: Click "View Seats" and choose your preferred seat(s).
q1.step3.desc: Select your Pick Point and Drop Point from available options.
q1.step4.desc: Continue as Guest and fill in your personal information.
q1.step5.opt2: Click Payment button → enter PIN in phone pop-up

q2.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my ticket?
q2.answer: Yes, cancellation and rescheduling options are available based on the bus operator’s policy.

q3.question: How do I view my booked tickets?
q3.answer: All your bookings can be viewed in the “My Tickets” section after logging into your Travler account. You can also download or print your ticket from there.

q1.question: What payment methods does Travler accept?

q2.question: Is it safe to pay online with Travler?
q2.answer: Yes, all payments are processed through secure, encrypted gateways to protect your financial information.

q3.question: Can I get a refund for my payment?
q3.answer: Refunds are processed according to the bus operator’s policy. If eligible, the amount will be returned to your original payment method within a few business days.

support.heading: Traveller Customer Support
support.subheading: We are here to help you anytime
support.intro: For enquiries, compliments or complaints, you can reach us through the following support channels:
support.liveChatDescription: Available directly on our website and mobile app

hero.description: Discover smarter routes, unbeatable deals, and a seamless booking experience — all in one place. Travel better, for less.

subject.label: Subject
subject.placeholder: Enter subject of enquiry / your message

conditions.1: This ticket is valid for the time and date of travel only.
conditions.2: The ticket cannot be altered, resold, transferred or refunded.
conditions.3: If for any reason the holder fails to report before departure time, the company accepts no responsibility for such passenger.
conditions.4: The ticket is treated as used if the holder fails to utilize it as indicated thereon.
conditions.5: The ticket holder must report at the booking office 30 minutes before the time specified on the ticket.
conditions.6: Drinking any alcohol, chewing miraa or smoking in the coach is prohibited.
conditions.7: Luggage carried at owner's risk. The company cannot be held responsible for damage, losses or delay. Passengers are to take care of their own luggage.
conditions.8: 20kgs of luggage is allowed free. Additional will be accepted on charge if space permits.
conditions.9: The management reserves the right to change the coach without prior notice or refund.
conditions.10: If in case a passenger breaks his journey en-route no refund shall be made.
conditions.11: A passenger is allowed free one baby only. Age limit 5 years.
conditions.12: Passengers are requested to ensure correctness of the booking office as mistakes cannot be rectified later.
conditions.13: Strictly no luggage should be passed through the window.
conditions.14: The passenger should ensure that the amount paid is clearly indicated on the ticket as per one's destination.
conditions.15: Time and date of booking should appear clearly on the ticket.

privacyPolicy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacyPolicy.intro1: The Internet is an amazing tool. It has the power to change the way we live, and we're starting to see that potential today. With only a few mouse-clicks, you can follow the news, look up facts, buy goods and services, and communicate with others from around the world. It's important to iabiri to help our customers retain their privacy when they take advantage of all the Internet has to offer.
privacyPolicy.intro2: We believe your business is no one else's. Your privacy is important to you and to us. So we'll protect the information you share with us. To protect your privacy, iabiri follows different principles in accordance with worldwide practices for customer privacy and data protection.

principles.item1: We won't sell or give away your name, mail address, phone number, email address or any other information to anyone.
principles.item2: We'll use state-of-the-art security measures to protect your information from unauthorized users.

notice.title: NOTICE
notice.text: We will ask you when we need information that personally identifies you (personal information) or allows us to contact you. Generally, this information is requested when you create a Registration ID on the site or when you download free software, enter a contest, order email newsletters or join a limited-access premium site. We use your Personal Information for four primary purposes:

purposes.item1: To make the site easier for you to use by not having to enter information more than once.
purposes.item2: To help you quickly find software, services or information.
purposes.item3: To help us create content most relevant to you.
purposes.item4: To alert you to product upgrades, special offers, updated information and other new services from iabiri.

consent.title: CONSENT
consent.text1: If you choose not to register or provide personal information, you can still use most of www.iabiri.com. But you will not be able to access areas that require registration.
consent.text2: If you decide to register, you will be able to select the kinds of information you want to receive from us by subscribing to various services, like our electronic newsletters. If you do not want us to communicate with you about other offers regarding iabiri products, programs, events, or services by email, postal mail, or telephone, you may select the option stating that you do not wish to receive marketing messages.
consent.text3: iabiri occasionally allows other companies to offer our registered customers information about their products and services, using postal mail only. If you do not want to receive these offers, you may select the option stating that you do not wish to receive marketing materials from third parties.

access.title: ACCESS
access.text: We will provide you with the means to ensure that your personal information is correct and current. You may review and update this information at any time at the Visitor Center. There, you can:

actions.item1: View and edit personal information you have already given us.
actions.item2: Tell us whether you want us to send you marketing information, or whether you want third parties to send you their offers by postal mail.
actions.item3: Sign up for electronic newsletters about our services and products.
actions.item4: Register. Once you register, you won't need to do it again. Wherever you go on www.iabiri.com, your information stays with you.

security.title: SECURITY
security.paragraph1: iabiri has taken strong measures to protect the security of your personal information and to ensure that your choices for its intended use are honored. We take strong precautions to protect your data from loss, misuse, unauthorized access or disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
security.paragraph2: We guarantee your e-commerce transactions to be 100% safe and secure. When you place orders or access your personal account information, you're utilizing secure server software SSL, which encrypts your personal information before it's sent over the Internet. SSL is one of the safest encryption technologies available.
security.paragraph3: iabiri strictly protects the security of your personal information and honors your choices for its intended use. We carefully protect your data from loss, misuse, unauthorized access or disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
security.paragraph4: Your personal information is never shared outside the company without your permission, except under conditions explained above. Inside the company, data is stored in password-controlled servers with limited access. Your information may be stored and processed in Kenya or any other country where iabiri, its subsidiaries, affiliates or agents are located.
security.paragraph5: You also have a significant role in protecting your information. No one can see or edit your personal information without knowing your user name and password, so do not share these with others.

noticeToParents.title: NOTICE TO PARENTS
noticeToParents.text1: Parents or guardians: we want to help you guard your children's privacy. We encourage you to talk to your children about safe and responsible use of their Personal Information while using the Internet.
noticeToParents.text2: The iabiri site does not publish content that is targeted to children. However, if you are concerned about your children providing iabiri any personal information without your consent, iabiri offers a Kids account. It allows parents to give parental consent for the collection, use and sharing of children's (ages 12 and under) personal information online.

enforcement.title: ENFORCEMENT
enforcement.contact: If for some reason you believe iabiri has not adhered to these principles, please notify us by email at info@iabiri.com, and we will do our best to determine and correct the problem promptly. Be certain the words Privacy Policy are in the Subject line.

electronicRegistration.title: ELECTRONIC PRODUCT REGISTRATION
electronicRegistration.text: When you buy and install a new product, we may ask you to register your purchase electronically. When you do, we merge your registration information with any information you've already left with us (we call that information your personal profile). If you haven't previously registered with us, we create a personal profile for you from your product registration information. If you ever want to review or update that information, you can visit the Profile Center, click on Update Profile, and edit any of the Personal Information in your profile. If you haven't already created a Registration ID, we will ask you to do so. This ensures that only you can access your information.

customerProfiles.title: CUSTOMER PROFILES
customerProfiles.text: As mentioned above, every registered customer has a unique personal profile. Each profile is assigned a unique personal identification number, which helps us ensure that only you can access your profile.
customerProfiles.cookieInfo: When you register, we create your profile, assign a personal identification number, then send this personal identification number back to your hard drive in the form of a cookie, which is a very small bit of code. This code is uniquely yours. It is your passport to seamless travel across www.iabiri.com, allowing you to download free software, order free newsletters, and visit premium sites without having to fill out registration forms with information you've already provided. Even if you switch computers, you won't have to re-register — just use your Registration ID to identify yourself.

informationUsage.title: WHAT WE DO WITH THE INFORMATION YOU SHARE
informationUsage.text1: When you join us, you provide us with your contact information, including Names, Phone Numbers, Age, Sex, ID Number and email address. We use this information to send you updates about your order, questionnaires to measure your satisfaction with our service and announcements about new and exciting services that we offer. When you order from us, we ask for your credit card number and billing address. We use this information only to bill you for the product(s) you order at that time. For your convenience, we do save billing information in case you want to order from us again, but we don't use this information again without your permission.
informationUsage.text2: We occasionally hire other companies to provide limited services on our behalf, including packaging, mailing and delivering purchases, answering customer questions about products or services, sending postal mail and processing event registration. We will only provide those companies the information they need to deliver the service, and they are prohibited from using that information for any other purpose.
informationUsage.text3: iabiri will disclose your personal information, without notice, only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: (a) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process served on iabiri or the site; (b) to protect and defend the rights or property of iabiri and its family of Websites, and, (c) to act in urgent circumstances to protect the personal safety of users of iabiri, its Websites, or the public.
